info.senderName: NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 10 at 7:50PM MDT until August 10 at 9:45PM MDT by NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...Portions of south central New Mexico, including the following county, Dona Ana and western Texas, including the following county, El Paso.
* WHEN...Until 945 PM MDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 750 PM MDT, the public reported heavy rain in the advisory area due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... West El Paso, Central El Paso, Northeast El Paso, East El Paso, Far East El Paso, Mission Valley, Sunland Park, Fort Bliss, Biggs Field, Fort Bliss Northeast and Franklin Mountains State Park. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM MDT THIS EVENING

area.areaDesc: Dona Ana, NM; El Paso, TX
